name: Halloween Slayer
description:
First Game Project in Class!

 A classic top-down shooter game! Weave your way through increasingly numerous hordes of ghosts, while firing your candy corn weapon. Keep playing to get the highest score possible, and experience the difference between the two included difficulties! 

 Controls:

> WASD to move

> Mouse to turn

> Spacebar/left click to shoot (you can hold it down!)

Credits:

Prototype Created By: Kirill U Graham W Luke L

Music: https://arcofdream.itch.io/monolith-ost -- -- And always remember, if it looks like a glitch, its actually an unintentional game feature!
